sentence in indonesian using the words: Komponen elektronik rusak harus segera diganti.
english translation: "Faulty electronic components need to be replaced immediately."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Komposisi musik ini sangat indah.
english translation: "This music composition is very beautiful."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka minum kopi tubruk di pagi hari.
english translation: "I like to drink Turkish coffee in the morning."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ada banyak pilihan kosmetik di toko ini.
english translation: "There are many cosmetic options in this store."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Gelas ini masih kosong, bisa saya isi minuman?
english translation: "This glass is still empty, can I fill it with a drink?"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong ambilkan saya kotak di rak atas tersebut.
english translation: "Please get me the box on that top shelf."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah seorang kritikus film terkenal di negara ini.
english translation: "He is a famous film critic in this country."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya membuat beberapa kue kering untuk acara besok.
english translation: "I made some cookies for tomorrow's event."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong simpan susu di dalam kulkas.
english translation: "Please keep the milk inside the refrigerator."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bunga di taman ini berwarna kuning langsat.
english translation: "The flowers in this garden are pale yellow."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sedang kupas apel untuk buat jus.
english translation: "I am peeling apples to make juice."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kurang berarti tidak cukup banyak.
english translation: "Less means not enough."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ia merasa kurang puas dengan hasil ini.
english translation: "He feels less satisfied with this result."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sayurannya kurang banyak, tolong tambahkan lagi.
english translation: "There is less quantity of vegetables, please add more."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sekolah ini memiliki kurikulum yang inovatif.
english translation: "This school has an innovative curriculum."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya duduk di kursi malas sambil membaca.
english translation: "I sit on the lounge chair while reading."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Di taman itu tersedia kursi panjang untuk istirahat.
english translation: "The park provides benches for resting."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan pergi ke laboratorium untuk melakukan penelitian.
english translation: "I will go to the laboratory to conduct research."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Petani itu sedang bekerja di ladang jagung.
english translation: "The farmer is working in the cornfield."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lagu ini sering diputar di radio setiap hari.
english translation: "This song is played on the radio every day."
